statements: SELECT * FROM learning_paths WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT learning_path FROM learning_paths WHERE last_accessed > '2021-01-01';
SELECT student_id, MAX(last_accessed) AS recent_access FROM learning_paths GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_students FROM learning_paths;
SELECT * FROM learning_paths ORDER BY last_accessed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM learning_paths WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT student_id, last_accessed FROM learning_paths WHERE last_accessed > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) FROM learning_paths GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM learning_paths WHERE learning_path ->> 'topic' = 'Math';
SELECT student_id, MIN(last_accessed) AS first_accessed FROM learning_paths GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, topic, progress_date FROM progress ORDER BY progress_date ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, topic FROM students JOIN progress ON students.student_id = progress.student_id;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE learning_path LIKE '%web%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, topic FROM students s, progress p WHERE s.student_id = p.student_id AND p.completed = true;
SELECT * FROM progress ORDER BY progress_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, COUNT(*) AS total_progress FROM students s, progress p WHERE s.student_id = p.student_id GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_progress > 3;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, learning_path FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students, Courses WHERE Students.student_id = 1 AND Courses.course_id = 1;
SELECT Students.student_name, Courses.course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, learning_path FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM Enrollments GROUP BY course_id HAVING total_students > 5;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments WHERE enrollment_id = 100;
SELECT progress_id, module_name FROM Progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY progress_id ASC;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;

SELECT DISTINCT student_name, course_name, completion_status FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Progress ON Enrollments.enrollment_id = Progress.enrollment_id;

SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS enrollment_count FROM Courses JOIN Enrollments ON Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING enrollment_count > 10 ORDER BY enrollment_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, learning_path FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, course_name, completed_percentage FROM students JOIN progress ON students.student_id = progress.student_id WHERE completed_percentage >= 50;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, learning_path FROM students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY enrollment_date;
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE completed_percentage > 50 ORDER BY student_id, course_id;
